summary: U.S. marshal John Carruthers observes a robbery and Sheriff Jake thinks he may be the culprit. Meanwhile the town's leading citizen is planning to rob everybody blind.

Carpenter|Lane Chandler|Jack Evans|Herman Hack|Henry Hall|Theodore Lorch|Bud McClure|Art Mix|Perry Murdock|George Nash|Herman Nowlin|Artie Ortego|Tex Phelps
keywords: b movie|b western|poverty row film|low budget film|double feature film
director: Director: Robert N. Bradbury (as Robert Bradbury)
title: Acero azul
